title: Electric field strength at outer surface

content.description: Two concentric spherical surfaces are drawn around an isolated positive charge +q located at their center, as shown above. The inner surface has a radius that is 1/2 that of the outer surface.
content.question: If the electric field strength at the inner surface is E, what is the electric field strength at the outer surface?

unit.text: 8: Electric Charges, Fields, and Gauss's Law

skill.text: 2.D: Predict new values or factors of change of physical quantities using functional dependence between variables.
